name: Pirate Pursuit
description:
A two player competitive game where you must grab the treasure and escape the cave's rising water. Punch your opponent and take the treasure from them at the right opportunity to leave them stunned with increasing pressure from the rising water. Players without the treasure may climb vine walls within the cenote and the players with the treasure will be slightly slower. Plan your path and avoid your opponent to escape the cenote with the prized treasure chest.

Controls:
- Move: Left Stick
- Camera: Right Stick
- Jump: A Button / Cross Button
- Punch: X Button / Square Button
